xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.2 Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.2.2 Akusalapada » 2.2.2.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇādi
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇādi
13.
1273Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  dve.
1274Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1275Ahetuko akusalo dhammo ahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1276Sahetuko akusalo ca ahetuko akusalo ca dhammā sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1277Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—  ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
14.
1278Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
